item.title: Getting Started with Semantic Kernel: Microsoft's Open Source AI Library for .NET
item.description: If you’re a .NET developer looking to integrate AI into your applications, Semantic Kernel might be exactly what you need. This open-source library from Microsoft provides a simple yet powerful way to work with different AI models in the .NET ecosystem.

item.title: Welcome to Code Addict Blog - A .NET Developer's AI Journey
